contents.author: Soju | X
contents.content:
Jupiter’s second LFG vote has ended!

Sorry for the late announcement, but wanted to take this chance to once again congratulate Sanctum & Uprock for winning the vote, and being the next 2 teams launched on LFG!! Excited to be working with them to ensure a good launch.

This time, we saw a record turn-out of 230M staked JUP participating, across 334K voters! We hope that every team that participated in the vote had a good time, and also gained traction and publicity from doing so.

During the vote, we also conducted a Twitter Spaces where the community shared feedback on the LFG process so far. We’ll be incorporating some of this feedback into LFG going forward, to improve the launchpad alongside the community. Expect an update on this soon.

Expect to see more introductions and improvements rolling out to Discord & LFG over the next few weeks. 

With this, we’ve concluded the second vote for LFG, and brainstormed improvements needed for the platform.

The CWG will be resuming introductions for the next round of LFG as well next week. If you’re interested in being part of LFG, apply on the forum!

https://jupresear.ch/c/lfg-intros/12

Once again, a thank you to our voters, project teams, and everyone for being part of this journey!

contents.author: Soju | X
contents.content:
In 10 minutes @meow | zer0 and @Kash will be live on YouTube with a special Planetary Call for the Jupiverse. 

We'll be sharing major announcements that will drive the Meta forward that will shape the narrative for 2024 and beyond for Jupiter. 

But as always, we need your feedback, questions, and input to make it perfect.

We'll be taking questions and discussions from both YouTube and Discord, head over to ⁠💬・general to drop us questions!

Watch it live: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=btcepQHl8rY

contents.author: meow | zer0
contents.content:
@everyone The decentralized meta has been an ongoing topic for Jupiter for quite a while now, but it has never been properly formalized, so lets do that today!

At 5pm Dubai time, I’ll be presenting at Token2049 about our longer term ideas around the meta, why it’s important, and how we intend to push it forward.

Then at 7pm (3p UTC), we will host a special planetary call session w @kashdhanda, where we will go through the slides together and discuss the ideas live via discord and youtube.

Links will be shared on Jupiter shortly.  Looking forward to discussing all these ideas, I hope it will be lots of fun for everyone!

contents.author: Soju | X
contents.content:
Announcing JupSOL – the highest yield LST on Solana, with trustless delegation to Jupiter’s Validator.

This validator has 0% fees and 100% MEV kickback and currently has an additional 100K SOL delegated to increase the yield on JupSOL. 

This will likely make JupSOL the highest yielding LST right now across all of Solana, until the APY normalizes and JupSOL completes it's bootstrapping phase. 

This enhanced APY will begin at the next Solana epoch, which you can view at https://stakewiz.com/, but is roughly expected to be around April 19, 2024 1:30 AM )

This validator is a crucial part of our plan to help our users land transactions better on Jupiter. More stake on this validator will allow Jupiter to send more transactions and reduce transactions affected by congestion.

This validator is run by Triton and we’re very grateful to have their expertise in ensuring the validator is world-class. 

JupSOL is also powered by Sanctum, allowing users to swap for and out of JupSOL while plugging into deep liquidity on Sanctum’s router.

Read more about how JupSOL works, written by @fp lee | sanctum.so from the Sanctum team: 

https://www.jupresear.ch/t/jupsol-jupiter-staked-sol/14666

If you are a member of the Jupiverse community, holding JupSOL helps you and your fellow Catdets land more transactions using Jupiter!

https://jup.ag/swap/SOL-JupSOL

Also, what is wonderland?

https://twitter.com/JupiterExchange/status/1780331042756350460

contents.author: Soju | X
contents.content:
The official LFG site for @ZeusNetworkHQ is live!

Link: https://lfg.jup.ag/zeus
Launch Time:Thursday, April 4, 2024 5:00 PM
Support: ⁠lfg-support 

Learn more about Zeus: https://zeusnetwork.xyz/#network 

Check your airdrop allocation, set up your DCA/Limit orders ahead of time, and see the exact countdown to ZEUS launch. 

1% of ZEUS total supply was airdropped to Jupiter voters during the Round #1 of LFG Voting that took place. Check your airdrop allocation if you voted!

There was an additional 2% distributed to other qualifying addresses, based on the criteria here: https://medium.com/@zeus-network/zeus-token-launch-and-airdrop-claiming-on-jupiter-lfg-launchpad-7e5528768f44 

Zeus is the first LFG project that Jupiter is launching, and we are very excited to share this milestone with them and the Jupiverse community.

See you on 4/4! 

@everyone

PSA: This airdrop is not part of Active Staking Rewards (ASR), the ASR distribution will take place in July

contents.author: Soju | X
contents.content:
The CWG Budget Vote has ended! 

After 3 days of voting, the DAO vote for the latest CWG budget proposal has settled at 75% for, 19% against and 6% abstain. 
Thanks to all the catdets that came through!

This result makes the Core Working Group the first Jupiter Working Group!

There are many learnings and insights from passionate community discussions in the past few days. 

The CWG will review improvements to the voting process in a post to https://jupresear.ch/ later tomorrow, alongside a town hall later this week.

Read some initial thoughts and changes from the CWG here: https://twitter.com/KEMOS4BE/status/1774651284337140197

contents.author: DeusNero | Kamino
contents.content:
Gm @Kamino Warriors, small update on best practices in general and Discord security

KAMINO TEAM MEMBERS WILL NEVER DM YOU

----------------------------------------

The Kamino Discord
If you see suspicious activity in our Discord (scam links, people asking others to dm them), instantly ping both @🌊 Moderator & @Thor's Hammer. We have global coverage and will instantly pull out the ban hammer
Only connect to the team via ⁠🆘・help-desk, never follow someone else's link

Scams from DMS
The team will NEVER dm you! Team members have a blue role called 'Kamino Contributors'. If someone does not have this role but is acting as a team member, they are scammers and you should ping @🌊 Moderator & @Thor's Hammer
If you want to play it safe, disable all direct messages in your Discord settings

Protect your private keys
Never ever enter your private keys into any website. The only place you will ever enter your private key is into a wallet software. This can be a desktop wallet, a browser extension or hardware wallet software
If anyone ever asks you for your private keys, they are trying to scam you - no customer support from any wallet provider would ever ask you for this
No Kamino team member will ever ask you for your private keys

Do not get your wallet drained
Be very careful with which sites you connect your wallet(s) to
Be careful which links you click
When you see any kind of airdrop, always triple check if you have the correct address. If not sure, ask and quadruple check
If you get random NFTs airdropped, assume they are scams, especially if they have a call to action for you to go to some website
Bookmark the apps you use, even searching via google can go wrong

General tips and tricks
If something seems too good to be true, it probably is
Use a hardware wallet, do not use it to interact with all apps, look into using a combination of cold (hardware) and hot (desktop) wallets in a security setup that makes sense to you

Stay safe 🫡

contents.author: Richard | Tensor 📈⚡WILL NOT DM
contents.content:
@everyone gm all, hope you all touched some grass since Season 3 ended... because Season 4 is now in FULL SWING 🔥 

Tensor Foundation has taken into account all the feedback we've received last season. We want set clear expectations of how Season 4 will work, and how it will not:

Points will be linear 👍. This means no curve will be applied, and there is no advantage to using multiple wallets. Screenshot this, frame it, hold the points system accountable to this.
Foundation still reserves the right to turn off points for collections ⭐️. This is to combat high wash trading activity we're seeing on certain collections.
There will not be a unified leaderboard 🥇. The split of points between different Tensor products (eg Marketplace vs Price Lock) will not be disclosed. Points will be allocated proportional to economic activity in each of these protocols. This means if price lock has low activity relative to the marketplace, it will earn fewer points.

The mechanics for Season 4 will work similar to Season 3, meaning the more you bid, list, or market-make closer to the floor, the more points you will earn. Tracking for S4 will be released once we have made a few adjustments to the system based on data we've collected in S3.

As a reminder, the points system is to ultimately reward users who contribute to most to growing Tensor protocols. This means:

✅ Providing liquidity earns points
✅ Tensorians earn a points multiplier
✅ Referrals earn both points and fees (must be a Tensorian)

Happy trading and here's to a fruitful Season 4!

contents.author: ilmoi | Tensor
contents.content:
A few smol things for Monday:

The announcement from the Foundation is expected 10am ET
Per Foundation, the announcement will contain tokenomics, governance docs, and a claim checker. You'll know your allocation at that point.
One hour later (11am ET) you'll be able to claim your tokens and trading will begin.
There has been some confusion around Treasure Boxes, so wanted to clarify. You ARE getting boxes for S3, but you will not be seeing them (or the S1/S2 boxes) on the claim site. To maximize the safety of the claim process the Foundation has gone with Jupiter's battle-tested infrastructure, and their claim site doesn't show boxes. So you'll just see your final allocation instead. Don't worry, loyalty has been factored in, and those of you who remained loyal got significantly more rare TBs.
Finally, on congestion. Solana right now is experiencing congestion. This is obviously not something we can predict/control, but we'll setup the infrastructure to be as robust as possible and the claim will be open for 6 months, so you'll have plenty of time to complete it.

Excited for the next chapter for the Tensor ecosystem.
